name: AuthenticatorAssertionResponse
description: The AuthenticatorAssertionResponse interface of the Web Authentication API is returned by CredentialsContainer.get() when a PublicKeyCredential is passed, and provides proof to a service that it has a key pair and that the authentication request is valid and approved.

refs.name: Web Authentication: An API for accessing Public Key Credentials Level 1
refs.description: The definition of 'AuthenticatorAssertionResponse interface' in the 'Web Authentication: An API for accessing Public Key Credentials Level 1' specification.
